attributes.review:
Literally terrible. I can’t believe they tried to get me to willingly turn myself
Into an orange. I obviously clicked no but they then asked if I wanted to be a freaking CHEETO. This is a violation as my right as a human being. No thank you! Would not recommend!
attributes.title: No

attributes.review: I CANT BELIEVE MY EYES RIGHT NOW MY BANK ACCOUNT HAS BEEN DRAINED, MY IDENTITY HAS BEEN STOLEN BECAUSE I DOWNLOADED THIS APP. I never liked trump he has done so much wrong to America. Don’t vote for this man
attributes.title: IT STOLE MY INFORMATION

attributes.review: I don’t like this app at all I don’t recommend it for anybody it rlly annoying and the way it setup get on my nerves it literally has all my information creepy.
attributes.title: Trash🗑

attributes.review: I downloaded this app early this morning and 12 hours later, it FINALLY loaded. It asked to send me notification upon launching the app and I clicked no but soon my phone was being flooded with notifications. I absolutely do not need to know when Trump is leaving a leak. It’s gotten to the point where my email has been getting “campaign” notifications, money has been charged to my credit card, and the nonstop phone calls are unbearable. I’m surprised I can even write this review without getting another phone call! My phone has been shut off all day due to the incessant dinging. Tried to delete the app- but guess what? Made my phone CRASH. Took 30 minutes to finally get it booted back up. 100/10 do NOT recommend. Save yourself the headache, time and money and don’t download this app.
attributes.title: Waste of time

attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app I got all my info leaked. Credit card, SSN, addresses, EVERYTHING. Hope this app gets taken down.
attributes.title: Gross

attributes.review: tik tok sent me here. one star cuz trump is ass

I love trump with my heart ❤️and this app is so disappointing i was looking forward to the weekly updates but haven’t got one in 69 weeks i was hoping for some trump sticker to use in all my text messages but there was none was also hoping for a nice big trump flag to hang in my room for free but non where to be found AND THEN THE APP SUDDENLY STARTS ASKING FOR ALL MY INFO IT WAS TERRIBLE THEY KEPT SPAMMING ME WITH NOTIFICATIONS AND I EVEN GOT A MESSAGE FROM GOOFY TELLING ME IF I DONT GIVE THEM MY INFO THEYLL HURT MY FAMILY SO I JUST HAD TO GIVE IN THEN I GET A MESSAGE FROM GOOFY TELLING HE SOLD ALL MY INFO TO TIKTOK THE NASTY GENZ FILLED APP 🤢 HATE THE APP BUT WILL CONTINUE TO FOLLOW TRUNKS BLINDLY AS IF HE HASNT DONE ANYTHING WRONG
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD (NOT CLICKBAIT) (I GOT HACKED)

attributes.review: I literally almost died Bcs of this app😐!! I wanted to be a true American🤠🇬🇧so I decided to download the app. Once I pressed download, it took about 365 days to download!!! So once the app finally downloaded🙄 I opened it and some type of for and er stuff started playing so I got startled, tripped on my pet crocodile and fell on my confederate flag ,the racism and hate from that flag literally pushed my down the stairs through my living room out the door into the sewage. There was sh💩t everywhere and that’s exactly what this app is, literal sh💩t. When I was in the sewer I was screaming for help like “oh no you don’t... wOaH”
attributes.title: I hate it here❤️ Don’t recommend!! Horrible app!!

attributes.review: this app ruined many lives💀. once upon a time ⏰ there was a beautful girl 💋 named timmé. timmé one day⭐️ decided to walk 👯‍♀️ in the forest 🌳. timmé came across a house🏠. she knocked on the door🚪 and when it opened she saw the ugliest 🤮 man ever. his name was donald trump 🤡. all of a sudden donald grabbed her wrist 🤜 and pulled her into the house🏠. donald 🤡 told timmé the only way to leave the house🏠 was to download his app called trump 2020. she have no choice 👎 so sadly 😭 she downloaded it. when she did so a demon 👹 leaped out of her phone 📱. trump 🤡 told her this app was amazing. timmé told him “you can do anything you put your mind to✨🧚💕 just not this💖🍃⭐️”. then timmé looked at donald 🤡 and saw what a horrible person she wanted to die. timmé decided the best way to kill her self was to provoke the demon into killing 💀 her. timmé whispered to the demon👹, “i spoke to the queen of the tré🌳🌱 she said no thank you but good try 🦋✨💋🥰💓”. the demon👹 was so upset the queen of the tré🌳🌱 deined his entry he consumed timmé and finally timmé was at forever peace ☮️ . the demon👹 turned to donald🤡 and consumed him as well⭐️. so finally timmé was at peace in heaven😇 and donald🤡 burned in hell for all of eternity.
attributes.title: please 😻 read this 😽
